Class Documentation

The following page documents each respective class within the software suite

Description: Containes and manages simulation data.
Inherits: SpatialOpps, PassGenerator

Description: Detects errors from static and dynamic datasets.
Inherits: Opps, ErrorDetectionInitializer, ErrorCompiler

Description: Contains vector operations for dataframe manipulation and analysis.

Description: Initializing and incrementing errors.
Inherits: ErrorDetectionComputations

Description: Assembles completed error calculations into anlysis data.

Description: Computes spatial operations.
Inherits: ShapeInitializer

Description: Helps cleanly initialize the simulator's shapes.

Description: Generates all start and end points of the paths, then uses PathFollower to generate center points and direction vectors of each segment.
Inherits: PathGenerator, TrackRecorder

Description: Generates the path based on given polygon. Inherits the polygon functionality to build upon and reuse functions.
Inherits: Polygon

Description: Error flagging, recording and incrementing for dynamic and static data.
Inherits: ErrorRecorder

Description: Records and outputs the simulated paths's track.
Sister Class: PassGenerator

Description: Adds functionality to record errors.
Inherits: ErrorFlagger

Description: Sets up a polygon and maintains rules to ensure functionality.
Inherits: GeomTools

Description: Contains functions to aide in geometry functions.
Inherits: Opps

Flags errors in desired order as jumps or drifts.

Description: Contains all simulation and error detection software to execute the primary processes in one centralized location.
Inherits: DatabaseManager, Plotter

Description: Generates plots for reports.
Inherits: BasePlots
Sister Class: Manager

Description: Sets up login for database.
QueryManager

Description: Manages database query functions.

Description: Contains plotter parameters and plot generation functions.

Description: Contains error ellipse dimensions, plotting and other functions.
Inherits: Coord

Description: Class contains all parameters to convert between coordinates and stores coordinate values.

Description: Sets up a vector with a start point and end point.
Inherits: Coord

Description: Inherits ErrorRecorder functionality and adds ability to record errors, jump and drift.
Inherits: ErrorOutputter

Description: Generates position based on std of N/E.

Description: Generates error dataframe and keys for completed error lists.

Description: Follows a desired path in increments and incorporates simulation errors.
Inherits: Vector

Description: Simulates error incorporated into pathFollower.
Inherits: ErrorDocumentor
